Posts.Content: All as I want to say is at your darkest moments remember it will heal. I had a massive wound two years ago. I believed the Consultant  when he said it would heal but would take time.  (I had too. )  I needed a lot of help. Even had hyperbaric treatment to help with the healing. It took several months. But it did heal. Yours will too x You so need to be given the dignity you deserve to talk to your consultant. Wishing you continued strength to deal with everything x
Posts.Title: Walking back to Happiness

Posts.Content: I empathise with you so much. I have no magic answers but I am with you all the way . I have oestrogen reactive BC and am very over weight. Of course I want to do something about it. But if it was that easy for me I  would not be overweight now, as I have tried so hard over the years. I have lost it only to regain it. I am not giving up but have to accept it will go of slowly. I have asked last week the dieticians on year for some advise and am waiting for areply. Just want to say you are not alone x
Posts.Title: Guys, in a bit of a panic regarding diet - of all things!!!
